title: Greg Miller Gets His First PS5 Trophy
description:
PlayStation Trophies have changed, and Greg's here to show what he can with his first-ever PS5 Bronze! The PS5 was provided by PlayStation for review.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody i'm greg miller and this is yet another playstation 5 video here on youtube.com kindafunnygames remember to like subscribe share all that jazz and also remember that playstation sent us the playstation 5 for review purposes uh so this is an interesting one so embargoes are listening today there's only so much we can do but we could show the one level of astrobot that's up as a first impressions and one of the things i thought i would do and tim encouraged me to do was hey it's going to be a big deal greg when you get your first playstation 5 trophy why don't you record you doing that we can put up a short video i said all right i did it i recorded it and as luck would have it when i clicked stop stream or stop recording on obs it corrupted and so that moment was gone i lost it forever or so i thought um of course on playstation 4 you'd pop a trophy and it would save the screenshot of the moment right trophy up here whatever that was happening just frozen there

i lost it forever or so i thought um of course on playstation 4 you'd pop a trophy and it would save the screenshot of the moment right trophy up here whatever that was happening just frozen there whatever when i was doing other stuff i shouldn't even say that actually i guess it happens again on playstation 5 in a completely different manner let's take a look that's rad right if you don't know the difference ladies and gentlemen before it was a screenshot it showed the trophy name up here like it just took a screenshot of the moment the trophy popped for playstation 5 it's giving you a lead in right it's giving you seconds of it it's giving a built-in graphic it's showing what kind of trophy it is bronze in this case uh it shows you the name pops up right one down lots more to go and then it shows you play up till you get it and then it pop up here then it also did the screenshot which if i'm editing correctly i'm showing you right now right that is automatically saved as well so

then it shows you play up till you get it and then it pop up here then it also did the screenshot which if i'm editing correctly i'm showing you right now right that is automatically saved as well so also cool actually while we're here look at that bronze trophy right that's that's that's a taller bronze boy than it used to be right redesigning the playstation trophy okay cool but i just thought this was neat i thought i lost this moment to time and i of course know that the playstation 5 was you know saving my trophy moments but i didn't realize it was going to do this and put this tlc into it of having the banner below showing it there and giving you these pre are these not pre-packaged hey pre-packaged moments in time of what happened when you pop these trophies uh this is awesome i think this is totally cool i can't wait to get my first platinum think about that too of how much more exciting this is to share on twitter for your platinum trophies or for your big moments in general

this is totally cool i can't wait to get my first platinum think about that too of how much more exciting this is to share on twitter for your platinum trophies or for your big moments in general of putting it up there and having this built-in graphics package on it shout out to you playstation ladies and gentlemen uh there's much more insightful and long-form coverage up right now in the form of course first impressions uh astros playroom you can catch blessing playing through and getting a whole mess of trophy i was on the playstation 5. that's up uh it's also up as a podcast kind of funny first impressions on top of that my unboxing the playstation 5 is live blessings unboxing of the playstation 5 is live and a brand spankin new episode of ps i love you xoxo is live featuring our impressions of the playstation 5. uh so far more on astro answering a bunch of questions and so on ladies and gentlemen this is all just the start of our playstation 5 coverage here on youtube.com

impressions of the playstation 5. uh so far more on astro answering a bunch of questions and so on ladies and gentlemen this is all just the start of our playstation 5 coverage here on youtube.com kindafunnygames if you wanna keep up and not subscribe but please please subscribe to the youtube channel uh you can go to kindafunny.com ps5 it's a playlist of all of our hands-on impressions of the play station five until next time ladies and gentlemen it's been our pleasure to serve you also remember playstation sent us this playstation 5 for review purposes
